price: 21. Yalli Nabii Muusak :kaak mameesitinay kaa ibbix, kaa tibbixeek lakal usuk kah suge caxxah kaa gacsennok kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf sanuʿīduhā sīratahā al-ūlā
